info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:02PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 700 PM MST... At 602 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claypool, or near Globe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City and Claypool. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 245 and 265. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 257. AZ Route 77 near mile marker 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
